text: The Tulkarm Governorate ( '; ') is an administrative district and one of 16 Governorates of Palestine located in the north-western West Bank. The governorate's land area is 268 square kilometres.Tulkarm governorate According to the Palestinian Central Bureau of Statistics, the governorate had a population of 172,800 inhabitants.Projected Mid -Year Population for Tulkarm Governorate by Locality 2004- 2006 The muhafaza or district capital is the city of Tulkarm. == Localities == The Tulkarm Governorate has 51 localities and two refugee camps (Tulkarm Camp and Nur Shams Camp). The towns and cities mentioned below have populations of over 1,000. === Municipalities === *Anabta *Attil *Bal'a *Baqa ash-Sharqiyya *Beit Lid *Deir al-Ghusun *Qaffin *Tulkarm ===Villages=== {| class="wikitable" |- !
